title: Jacob Soboroff Looks at Fentanyl's Deadly Reach
description: MSNBC's Jacob Soboroff says that he didn't grasp the true scope of the opioid crisis until he began traveling across the nation and talking to people on the ground.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
